pullrequest.title: Use Actuator component to communicate between MulticopterVelocityControl and MulticopterMotorModel systems

content.raw: FYI, this PR does not affect the behavior of the `MulticopterVelocityControl` system. It should continue to operate as it did before. This fix is to ensure that the controller will operate as expected even when other processes have high disk writes.
content.html: FYI, this PR does not affect the behavior of the MulticopterVelocityControl system. It should continue to operate as it did before. This fix is to ensure that the controller will operate as expected even when other processes have high disk writes.
